resources.string: {"status":true,"recipes":[{"id":"2307","author_id":"16","title":"Kremasti doma\u0107i sladoled od jagode i stevije","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2307-570280c249a6f.jpg","image_size":"800x667","difficulty":"2","default_serving_size":"2","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"240","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"34","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-04 14:57:06","updated_at":"2016-04-07 13:50:57","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"12805","text":"Prokuvati jagode, sok i koru narand\u017ee dok se masa ne prepolovi. Rastvorite \u017eelatin u malo klju\u010dale vode i kada je pire gotov, dodajte i \u017eelatin","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12806","text":"Izme\u0161ajte \u017eumanca sa mlekom i stevijom i kuvajte na pari uz stalno me\u0161anje (najbolje \u017eicom za me\u0161anje) dok se ne zgusne. Kada se zgusne, ubacite i slatku pavlaku.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12807","text":"Spojite pire od jagoda i krem od pavlake, pa ohladite kremu. Dodajte vodku ili vanilu. Probajte i korigujte zasla\u0111iva\u010de ako ima potrebe.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12808","text":"Ohladite u zamrziva\u010du u prekrivenoj ve\u0107oj posudi dok masa ne postane polu-stegnuta. Izvadite iz zamrziva\u010da i prome\u0161ajte mikserom\/varja\u010dom. Ako vas ne mrzi uradite ovo vi\u0161e puta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"80","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12809","text":"Vratite u zamrziva\u010d i kada se potpuno stegne servirajte u staklenim \u010da\u0161ama uz sve\u017ee jagode, rendanu \u010dokoladu, blan\u0161irane bademe ili pista\u0107i. Mo\u017eete da ukrasite i umu\u0107enom slatkom pavlakom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"120","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"6"},{"id":"12"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"194","quantity":"1000.00","preferred_measure":"thousand"},{"id":"528","quantity":"240.00","preferred_measure":"cup"},{"id":"141","quantity":"240.00","preferred_measure":"cup"},{"id":"387","quantity":"4.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2022","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"143","quantity":"500.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"497","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"794","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"}]},{"id":"2333","author_id":"16","title":"Originalna Cezar salata","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2333-5704b962cc50a.jpg","image_size":"800x532","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"1","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"75","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"29","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-06 07:23:14","updated_at":"2016-04-13 13:11:04","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"12924","text":"Ispecite u rerni jedno ve\u0107e belo meso pileta ili izgrilujte debele \u0161nicle od belog mesa. Jedini za\u010din je so i soli se pred kraj. Spremljeno pile\u0107e meso se se\u010de na tanke, izduzene komadice (listice).","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12925","text":"secite komade crnog tost hleba na kockice.agrejte malo maslinovog ulja na srednju temperaturu i ispri\u017eite kockice uz neprestano okretanje, dok ne budu zlatne i krckave. Ovo mo\u017eete da uradite i u rerni. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12926","text":"Nekoliko listi\u0107a tanko rezane pan\u010dete ispr\u017eite na tiganju bez dodavanja ulja. Trebalo bi da slanina ostane u ve\u0107im i tankim komadima pri serviranju, mada se de\u0161ava da neko zbog prakti\u010dnosti isecka slaninu.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12927","text":"Salatu oprati, dobro osu\u0161iti i ise\u0107i na trakice ili kockice. Ostaviti u fri\u017eideru 20-ak minuta da bude krckavija","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"20","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12928","text":"Preliv za Cezar salatu: Koristite sastojke od majoneza pa na dole. Olju\u0161tite beli luk i stavite u veliku \u010diniju za salatu. Istrljajte lukom celu \u010diniju dok ne po\u010dne da se raspada i bacite delove. Za ovu salatu dovoljno je samo malo ulja belog luka koje ostane u \u010diniji. U istoj \u010diniji izgnje\u010dite viljuskom in\u0107une (ili sardine) \u0161to sitnije, dodajte majonez, senf i sok limuna, dodajte vrlo malo soli i biber i dobro umutite. Gustu masu koju ste dobili, malo razbla\u017eite maslinovim uljem i po \u017eelji \u2013 ako ho\u0107ete laganiji i re\u0111i preliv dodajte i jogurt.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"10"},{"id":"16"},{"id":"21"},{"id":"22"},{"id":"27"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"215","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"299","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"1066","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"395","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"192","quantity":"60.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"206","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"cup"},{"id":"1044","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"1047","quantity":"3.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"33","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"12","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"28","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"8","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"tsp"},{"id":"320","quantity":"45.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"}]},{"id":"2430","author_id":"16","title":"Low Carb mafini bez bra\u0161na","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2430-570fa1ee30ab0.jpg","image_size":"800x496","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"4","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"60","utensils":"modle, silikonski pleh za mafine","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"21","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-14 13:58:06","updated_at":"2016-04-14 13:58:20","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13504","text":"Napravite osnovu za mafine koja je uvek ista, za uobi\u010dajeni pleh za mafine i projice sa 12 otvora. U osnovu idu 2 cela jaja, velika kocka sira (veli\u010dine kao ve\u0107a jabuka), malo belog bibera, malo belog luka, per\u0161un.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"20","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13505","text":"U to ubacite neko povr\u0107e, mi smo koristili karfiol. Kada kuvate karfiol, \u010dekajte da prvo provri voda. Ubacite krupno narezan karfiol. Ovo se kuva dok umereno ne omek\u0161a, \u0161to je oko 10 minuta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13506","text":"Na kraju ide meso koje je opciono. Silikonski kalup stavite na resetku od rerne i ne podmazujte. Podelite ka\u0161ikom masu u 12 kalupova. Ubacite u rernu na nekih 160-180 stepeni i pecite dok mafini ne porumene. Savr\u0161eno se ispeku i budu \u010dvrsti. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"20"},{"id":"21"},{"id":"30"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"42","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2116","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"1292","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"12","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"39","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"1121","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2118","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2379","author_id":"9","title":"\u0160trudla sa \u010dokoladom i orasima","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2379-570b79a664936.jpg","image_size":"800x1200","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"4","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"100","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"10","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"21","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-11 10:17:10","updated_at":"2016-04-14 09:07:47","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13172","text":"U mlako mleko stavite kvasac, ka\u0161i\u010dicu \u0161e\u0107era i bra\u0161na. Ostavite da nado\u0111e.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"20","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13173","text":"U odgovaraju\u0107i sud sjedinite ulje i \u017eumanca. Sipajte mleko sa nado\u0161lim kvascem, \u0161e\u0107er u prahu i vanilu. Prome\u0161ajte, a zatim bra\u0161nom zamesite testo. Ostavite da nado\u0111e.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13174","text":"Fil: U mleko dodajte \u010dokoladu i \u0161e\u0107er i postepenim zagrevanjem istopite. Posebno sjedinite mlevene orahe i kakao, a zatim prelijte \u010dokoladnim mlekom. Belanca (2 kom) malo umutite i sjedinite sa prethodnom smesom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13175","text":"Nado\u0161lo testo razvucite na 50 x 40 cm. Prema\u017eite pripremljenim filom i urolajte tako da du\u017eina \u0161trudle bude 40 cm. \u0160trudlu uvrtite dva puta i stavite u podmazan kalup. Prema\u017eite umu\u0107enim belancetom i no\u017eem zare\u017eite preko sredine, dubine oko 2 cm. Ostavite da \u0161trudla nado\u0111e, a zatim pecite na 180 \u00b0C 40 minuta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"40","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"28"},{"id":"33"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"136","quantity":"500.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"141","quantity":"200.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"50","quantity":"5.00","preferred_measure":"tsp"},{"id":"66","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"6","quantity":"45.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"387","quantity":"3.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"50","quantity":"150.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"68","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"141","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"65","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"50","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"405","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"483","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"386","quantity":"3.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2310","author_id":"16","title":"Panna Cotta s vanilom","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2310-570364d1dd054.jpg","image_size":"800x600","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"4","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"150","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"14","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-05 07:10:09","updated_at":"2016-04-11 08:30:37","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"12817","text":"\u017delatin ume\u0161ajte u hladno mleko, zagrejte dok se ne rastopi. Dodajte ostale sastojke i jednostavno skuvajte.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"25","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12818","text":"Kuvani krem malo prohladite pa sipajte u kalup da se ohladi u fri\u017eideru, najbolje preko no\u0107i.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"120","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"12819","text":"Najbolje je da panakotu i rabarbara sos servirate uz jagode jer miris rabarbare podse\u0107a na njih. Mada je i mandarina bila OK","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"6"},{"id":"12"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"141","quantity":"150.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"497","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"143","quantity":"250.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2023","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2024","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2416","author_id":"16","title":"Cheesecake sa vi\u0161njama","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2416-570f62acb6a6c.jpg","image_size":"800x551","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"4","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"120","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"10","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-14 09:28:12","updated_at":"2016-04-14 09:28:34","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13437","text":"Kora: Umutiti 3-4 belanaca sa Stevia prahom. Dodati par kasika mlevenih oraha i par ka\u0161ika seckanih oraha. Masa bi trebalo da bude gusta. Kalup oblo\u017eite papirom za pe\u010denje i ispecite koru.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13438","text":"Paprir za pe\u010denje je obavezan, jer kora nema bra\u0161na i \u0161e\u0107era, koji joj daju gustinu. Zato treba da se su\u0161i na ni\u017eoj temperaturi. U svakom slu\u010daju bi\u0107e tanka i mora pa\u017eljivo da se odlepi sa papira. Odlepljenu koru stavite na \u010dist papir za pe\u010denje posut sa malo mlevenih oraha i vratite u opran kalup (isti u kome ste pekli) i vratite obru\u010d.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13439","text":"Fil: Umutiti sir (450g) sa oko 300 ml punomasnog jogurta \u2013 ili za \u201eheavy\u201c varijantu koristite slatku pavlaku umesto jogurta. Na ringli, na ba\u0161 tihoj vatri, u malo vode rastvoriti 15g zelatina (3 ravne ka\u0161i\u010dice). ","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13440","text":"Kad se \u017eelatin rastopi u zagrejanoj vodi, skloniti sa ringle i dodati Steviju i sok 1 manjeg limuna. Sipati ovo u masu sira. Umutite. Proverite da li je ukus OK i po \u017eelji ga korigujte sa jo\u0161 malo Stevija praha ili limunom. Kad je OK, sipajte preko ispe\u010dene kore. Ostaviti da se ohladi i stegne u frizderu.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13441","text":"Preliv: Oko 300g vi\u0161anja, sok 1 ve\u0107e isce\u0111ene narand\u017ee i 10g (1 supena ka\u0161ika \u017eelatina) malo prokuvati. Skinuti sa ringle i dodati malo Stevije. Po \u017eelji mo\u017ee da se ubaci i jedna kocka crne \u010dokolade (one sa 85% kakaa) ili ka\u0161i\u010dica kakao praha. Ovo sme da se sipa na beli fil tek kada se preliv dobro prohladi, a sam beli fil se potpuno stegne.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"12"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"386","quantity":"4.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2022","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"787","quantity":"60.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"405","quantity":"60.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2059","quantity":"450.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"320","quantity":"300.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"928","quantity":"25.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"206","quantity":"240.00","preferred_measure":"cup"},{"id":"484","quantity":"300.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"528","quantity":"240.00","preferred_measure":"cup"},{"id":"2029","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"}]},{"id":"2434","author_id":"16","title":"Bajadera kesten i stevija ","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2434-57109ea9307cc.jpg","image_size":"800x571","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"2","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"100","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"4","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-15 07:56:25","updated_at":"2016-04-15 07:56:51","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13517","text":"Recept za kuvanje kestena ide ovako: operite kesten, izre\u017eite na njemu no\u017eem slovo \u201eX\u201c da bi se kasnije lak\u0161e lju\u0161tio i kuvajte oko 45-60 minuta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"60","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13518","text":"Dobra stvar je \u0161to i onako morate da pravite pire, pa se\u010denja no\u017eem mo\u017eete kesten da recnete ve\u0107im makazama \u201edo pola\u201c, skuvanog ga prepolovite i onda \u010distite tako \u0161to tupim no\u017eem ili ka\u0161i\u010dicom vadite kesten\u010di\u0107e iz polovina ljuske","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13519","text":"Osnovna masa za kesten-bajaderu: Izgnje\u010dite kesten vilju\u0161kom pa onda mo\u017eete i presom za pire krompir, dodati oko 100g mlevenih badema, oko 70g rastopljenog malaca, punu ka\u0161iku kokosovog ulja i malo stevije.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13520","text":"Podelite masu na dva dela i u jedan deo ide oko 40g rastopljene crne \u010dokolade od 70% kakaa. Prvu, svetliju masu preko providne folije spustite u \u010detvrtastu manju posudu i \u201eutapkati\u201c da bude ravno, i preko tofa ide sloj sa \u010dokoladom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"551","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"1560","quantity":"70.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2126","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2023","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2127","quantity":"700.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"611","quantity":"40.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2409","author_id":"16","title":"Medaljoni po uzoru na Mocart kugle","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2409-570e148a77fae.jpg","image_size":"800x534","difficulty":"2","default_serving_size":"2","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"150","utensils":"modle, silikonski kalup za mafine, mlin za kafu, secko","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"4","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-13 09:42:34","updated_at":"2016-04-14 09:08:34","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13422","text":"Dan ranije: Prelijte 120g badema vrelom vodom i ostavite da odstoji 10-ak minuta. Skinite ko\u017eu i neka se su\u0161e do sutra. O\u010distite 100g pista\u0107ija. Prelijte ga vrelom vodom i ostavite da odstoji. Lako se skida ko\u017ea i vi\u0161e nije slan. Mora dobro da se osu\u0161i do sutra za mlevenje. Dobi\u0107ete oko 50g pista\u0107ija.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13423","text":"Dan pripreme:U mlin za kafu ubacite blan\u0161irane bademe i 2 ka\u0161ike inulina. Sameljite u fino bra\u0161no. Odlo\u017eite u \u010diniju. O\u010distite mlin salvetom pa sameljite pista\u0107i i 1 ka\u0161iku inulina. Stavite ovo u drugu \u010diniju. Na kraju sameljite i le\u0161nike sa ka\u0161ikom kakao praha. Stavite u tre\u0107u \u010diniju.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13424","text":"Istopite u \u0161erpici 10ml vode, 1 punu ka\u0161iku eritritola, steviju na vrh no\u017ea i odprilike 1 punu ka\u0161iku kakao putera (ili putera). Sklonite sa ringle i dodajte par kapi arome badema ako \u017eelite. Ume\u0161ajte u ovo mlevene pista\u0107i. Podelite masu u 12 otvora na kalupu za mafine. Stavite kalup na \u010dvrstu podlogu i odnesite u fri\u017eider da se stegne.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"20","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13425","text":"Za drugi sloj sipajte u \u0161erpicu 3 ka\u0161ike vode, 2 ka\u0161ike eritritola i stevije na vrh no\u017ea. Masu od le\u0161nika i kakaa prebacite u secka. Prelijte rastopljenim eritritolom i blendujte dok ne dobijete ne\u0161to \u0161to li\u010di na doma\u0107u nutelu.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13426","text":"Isti postupak:U \u0161erpicu 20-25ml vode, 2 ka\u0161ike eritritola, na vrh no\u017ea stevije, oko 2 pune ka\u0161ike putera. Rastopite. Ume\u0161ate u mlevene bademe i sipate preko sloja od le\u0161nika koji se stegao. Ponovo vratite u fri\u017eider i zaboravite ga tamo koji sat.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"25","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13427","text":"Glazura: Dno kalupa zamastiti kokosovim uljem. Rastopiti malo \u010dokolade i staviti samo da prekrije dno. Vratiti u fri\u017eider. Izvadite iz fri\u017eidera, staviti jo\u0161 malo nove rastopljene \u010dokolade. Ova ne sme da bude vrela da ne upropasti \u201edno\u201c (koje \u0107e postati vrh medaljona), onda izvaditi medaljone iz fri\u017eidera i spistiti u kalup. \u010cokolada se prelila i preko gornje strane medaljona. Sve se vrati u fri\u017eider i ponovo zaboravi tamo na jo\u0161 koji sat.","en_text":"","seq_num":"5","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"6"},{"id":"12"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"561","quantity":"120.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"653","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"806","quantity":"70.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2091","quantity":"45.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2029","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2058","quantity":"75.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2023","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2092","quantity":"45.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"314","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"555","quantity":"150.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2433","author_id":"16","title":"Savr\u0161eno so\u010dni bataci i karabataci","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2433-57109b172eb53.jpg","image_size":"800x542","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"2","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"80","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"2","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-15 07:41:11","updated_at":"2016-04-15 07:41:24","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13514","text":"Pile\u0107e batake oguliti sa po\u010detka koske i mo\u017eete skinuti i ko\u017eu sa bataka i karabataka. Cilj jeste bio da se ima LowCarb i masno jelo, ali nema potrebe za preterivanjima. Da skratite vreme pripreme na tiganju, prvo su bataci i karabataci bili pe\u010deni u rerni ispod folije, samo da omek\u0161aju (ostali su bledi). Zatim su pore\u0111ani na tiganj, dodatno ispr\u017eeni da dobiju boju i na samom kraju su preliveni sosom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"60","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13515","text":"Za serivranje je potrebno pripremiti i Ma\u00eetre d\u2019H\u00f4tel Butter \u2013 tradicionalni recept za puter za\u010dinjen sve\u017eim per\u0161unom i limunovim sokom. Oko 120-150g putera prvo odstoji na sobnoj temperaturi a onda se dobro umuti vilju\u0161kom ili mikserom da postane kremast. Tek tada se dodaje oko 4 ka\u0161ike seckanog per\u0161una i 2 ka\u0161ike limunovog soka. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13516","text":"Jelo je servirano sa blago ispr\u017eenim cherry paradajzom i zelenom salatom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"16"},{"id":"21"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"943","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"39","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"206","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"22","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"233","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"395","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2436","author_id":"16","title":"Praline sa stevijom","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2436-5710df203f43b.jpg","image_size":"800x497","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"1","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"75","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"1","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-15 12:31:28","updated_at":"2016-04-15 12:31:35","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13524","text":"Zagrejte vodu u lon\u010detu za kafu, sklonite sa ringle kada provri i ubacite bademe u vrelu vodu da bi im skinuli ko\u017eu. O\u010distite pista\u0107i i operite ga od soli. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"25","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13525","text":"Rastopite u kerami\u010dkoj ili staklenoj posudi \u010dokoladu i kada je otopljena dodajte kokosovo ulje da bi bila te\u010dnija i mek\u0161a i malo stevije po ukusu. Dodajte i rum ako \u017eelite.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13526","text":"Manjom ka\u0161i\u010dicom sipajte nekoliko kapi \u010dokolade na dno kalupa. Za to vreme ubacite badem i pista\u0107i u mlin za kafu i sameljite ih u fino \u201ebra\u0161no\u201c. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13527","text":"Prebacite samlevene bademe i pista\u0107i u posudu u kojoj je ka\u0161ika kokosovog ulja bila na spobnoj temperaturi i dodajte malo stevije. Izme\u0161ajte sve i fil je gotov.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"15","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13528","text":"Istresite masu od badema i pista\u0107ija na providnu foliju i oblikujte valjak i na kratko ga stavite u fri\u017eider. Posle par minuta dodatno spljo\u0161tite stranice da bi isekli no\u017eem 15 kockica koje mogu da stanu u va\u0161 kalup.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13529","text":"Pore\u0111ajte kockice od badema i pista\u0107ija na dno od \u010dokolade, tako da sa svih bo\u010dnih strana i pri vrhu ostane malo slobodnog prostora u koji \u0107ete naliti preostalu \u010dokoladu. Ponovo vratite u fri\u017eider da se sve stegne. Za to vreme ponovo malo zagrejte preostalu \u010dokoladu i ne preterujte da ne bi bila vrela i pokvarila oblik kockica.","en_text":"","seq_num":"5","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13530","text":"Kada se masa u kalupu ohladi pa\u017eljivo prelijte pralinice \u010dokoladom dok ne napunite kalup. Ostavite u fri\u017eideru i kasnije servirajte u malim papirnatim korpicama.","en_text":"","seq_num":"6","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"555","quantity":"100.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2126","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2023","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"783","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"499","quantity":"70.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"653","quantity":"70.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"2435","author_id":"16","title":"Narand\u017easti ra\u010di\u0107i u ananas salsi","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2435-5710a6a6724ee.jpg","image_size":"800x1003","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"1","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"60","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"0","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-15 08:30:30","updated_at":"2016-04-15 08:30:55","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13521","text":"Ra\u010di\u0107i su jako jednostavni i zahvalni \u0161to se pr\u017eenja ti\u010de, jer im je sa jedne strane dovoljno od 2 do 4 minuta. Kao i svako drugo meso, ra\u010di\u0107e treba priripremiti za kuvanje ili pr\u017eenje. Obzirom na brkove i glave koje imaju, prvo se svakako otarasite glave.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13522","text":"Za salsu (koja mo\u017ee da se spremi i dosta ranije i servira na sobnoj temperaturi) pripremite: sitno seckani crveni luk, koji malo ispr\u017eite na maslinovom ulju, zatim mu dodate oko 1\/3 sitno seckanog ananasa i ako imate malo ruma, ubacite ka\u0161iku meda, 2 pune ka\u0161ike tamari sosa, so, beli biber i \u010dili-prah.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"20","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13523","text":"Gotovo je kada luk i ananas potpuno omek\u0161aju i treba da se oseti ljutina \u010dilija.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"10"},{"id":"29"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"38","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"117","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"783","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"202","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"2128","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"1292","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"1033","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"57","quantity":"1000.00","preferred_measure":"thousand"}]},{"id":"2424","author_id":"16","title":"Ljubi\u010dasta torta","en_title":"","image_file_name":"https:\/\/tastly.net\/uploads\/recipe\/original\/recipe-2424-570f9637c3678.jpg","image_size":"800x583","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"2","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"70","utensils":"","en_utensils":"","description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"15","post_id":"0","post_url":"","likes":"0","is_featured":"1","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2016-04-14 13:08:07","updated_at":"2016-04-14 13:08:15","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"13476","text":"Biskvit: Umutiti \u010dvrsto dva belanca. Dva \u017eumanca posebno umutiti sa Stevijom, vanilinim \u0161e\u0107erom i naribanom koricom limuna. 1 ka\u0161iku bra\u0161na i 2 ka\u0161ike mlevenih le\u0161nika dodati u \u017eumanca. Kada je umu\u0107eno, laganim me\u0161anjem (varja\u010dom!) dodati i belanca. Pe\u010de se u kalupu za torte na 170 stepeni oko 20-25 minuta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"30","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13477","text":"Fil 1: O\u010distiti 600g kupina i ocediti ih. Odvojiti 300g za blender, 250g za re\u0111enje na koru i 50g za ukra\u0161avanje. 300g kupina izblendovati i procedit. Izblendovati i 500g kajsija i spojiti sa kupinama. Ume\u0161ati malo vanile i prokuvati blendovano vo\u0107e.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13478","text":"U odvojenu posudu ubaciti 50ml vode, 2 ka\u0161ike \u017eelatina i prokuvati da se \u017eelatin rastvori. Skloniti sa ringle i ume\u0161ati Steviju. Spojiti \u017eelatin i vo\u0107e. \u201eRazbiti\u201c 100g sira sa malo mleka i dodati u ohladjenu masu od kupina i kajsija.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13479","text":"Fil 2: 500g jogurta i 200g sira izme\u0161ati. Rastopiti na ringli punu ka\u0161iku \u017eelatina i Steviju. Dodati to u jogurt.","en_text":"","seq_num":"3","timer":"10","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13480","text":"Preliv : Prokuvati 1 ravnu ka\u0161iku \u017eelatina sa sokom 1 ve\u0107e narand\u017ee, \u010da\u0161om vode, malo Stevije.","en_text":"","seq_num":"4","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null},{"id":"13481","text":"Fil 2 se dodaje tek kada se Fil 1 dobro stegne u fri\u017eideru. Preliv se sipa tek kada seFil 2 dobro stegne u fri\u017eideru.","en_text":"","seq_num":"5","timer":"5","timer_name":"","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"28"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"386","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"387","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"2023","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"68","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"827","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"741","quantity":"15.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"405","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"809","quantity":"600.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"607","quantity":"500.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"314","quantity":"50.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"928","quantity":"30.00","preferred_measure":"tbsp"},{"id":"323","quantity":"300.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"320","quantity":"500.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"528","quantity":"240.00","preferred_measure":"cup"}]},{"id":"1196","author_id":"9","title":"Zape\u010deni krompir sa piletinom i \u0161ampinjonima","en_title":null,"image_file_name":"http:\/\/recipe.bstorm.co\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/1504190046-550x510.jpg","image_size":"550x510","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"4","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"60","utensils":"tiganj, pleh","en_utensils":null,"description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"10","post_id":"26","post_url":"http:\/\/recipe.bstorm.co\/2015\/05\/04\/zapeceni-krompir-sa-piletinom-i-sampinjonima\/","likes":"4135","is_featured":"0","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2015-06-07 19:16:45","updated_at":"2015-12-07 13:16:28","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"3109","text":"Krompir olju\u0161titi, ise\u0107i na kockice, preliti ka\u0161ikom ulja, prome\u0161ati, a onda i za\u010diniti. Slo\u017eiti na dno odgovaraju\u0107eg pleha. Piletinu ise\u0107i na kockice, premazati senfom, za\u010diniti i na minut dva propr\u017eiti sa obe strane. Staviti preko krompira. ","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"0","timer_name":"Priprema mesa i krompira","image_file_name":null},{"id":"3110","text":"U ulju u kome se pr\u017eila piletina propr\u017eiti sitno iseckane \u0161ampinjone. \u0160ampinjone rasporediti preko krompira i mesa. Isekati mladi luk i posuti preko svega.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"0","timer_name":"Priprema \u0161ampinjona","image_file_name":null},{"id":"3111","text":"Izmiksati jaje i neutralnu pavlaku, za\u010diniti biljnim za\u010dinom i preliti preko jela. Na kraju posuti susamom i staviti da se pe\u010de u zagrejanoj rerni na 200 \u00b0C oko 45-50 minuta.","en_text":"","seq_num":"2","timer":"50","timer_name":"Pe\u010denje u rerni","image_file_name":null}],"tags":[{"id":"5"},{"id":"11"},{"id":"16"},{"id":"21"},{"id":"22"},{"id":"24"},{"id":"34"}],"ingredients":[{"id":"20","quantity":"400.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"216","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"40","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"32","quantity":"150.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"224","quantity":"2.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"42","quantity":"1.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"17","quantity":"200.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"88","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"319","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"39","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"},{"id":"6","quantity":"0.00","preferred_measure":"regular"}]},{"id":"1537","author_id":"9","title":"Sendvi\u010d tikvice","en_title":null,"image_file_name":"http:\/\/recipe.bstorm.co\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/2010_0804001-412x510.jpg","image_size":"412x510","difficulty":"1","default_serving_size":"1","default_calories":null,"preparation_time":"20","utensils":"tiganj","en_utensils":null,"description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"10","post_id":"906","post_url":"http:\/\/recipe.bstorm.co\/2015\/05\/11\/sendvic-tikvice\/","likes":"2598","is_featured":"0","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2015-06-20 21:35:24","updated_at":"2016-01-29 10:22:10","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"4142","text":"Tikvicu ise\u0107i na krugove, debljine od 2-3 mm. Sendvi\u010d tikvice slagati tako \u0161to prvo stavite krug tikvice, zatim \u0161unku, ka\u010dkavalj, opet \u0161unku i na kraju zavr\u0161iti sa tikvicom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"0","timer_name":"Priprema sendvi\u010da","image_file_name":null},{"id":"4143","text":"Umu\u0107enim jajima dodati bra\u0161no i \u201esendvi\u010de\u201c umakati u ovu smesu, zatim u prezle. Sjediniti bra\u0161no sa pra\u0161kom za pecivo zatim dodati prethodnoj smesi, a onda i umu\u0107ena belanca i najmanjom brzinom izmiksati. Sipati u podmazan pleh i pe\u0107i u zagrejanoj rerni na 180 \u00b0C oko 18-20 minuta. Koru izvaditi ih pleha zatim gornji deo okrenete prema dole. Pe\u010denu koru ohladiti zatim prese\u0107i uzdu\u017e na pola da dobijete dve kore.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"20","timer_name":"Pati\u0161panj","image_file_name":null},{"id":"2173","text":"Vodu i 100gr \u0161e\u0107era staviti da provri zatim dodati \u010dokoladu, skloniti sa vatre i dodati 1 kiselu pavlaku sobne temperature .\r\nJednu polovinu premazati filom tako \u0161to ste prethodno sjedinili 3 kisele pavlake i \u0161e\u0107er u prahu, staviti drugu koru i prefilovati glazurom.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"0","timer_name":"Fil i \u0161erpa","en_utensils":null,"description":null,"en_description":null,"blog_id":"12","post_id":"581","post_url":"http:\/\/recipe.bstorm.co\/2015\/05\/10\/americke-palacinke\/","likes":"2124","is_featured":"0","is_deleted":"0","created_at":"2015-06-21 17:49:41","updated_at":"2016-02-19 16:48:37","country_id":"184","user_id":"5","video":null,"is_approved":"1","steps":[{"id":"4445","text":"Napravite prvo preliv za pala\u010dinke. Vi\u0161nje preliti sa sokom ili vodom, dodati \u0161e\u0107er, pa staviti na vatru da klju\u010da. Kuvati tako desetak minuta, a onda dodati gustin razmu\u0107en u malo vode ili soka. Kuvati jo\u0161 2-3 minuta(na manjoj temperaturi) da se dobije gu\u0161\u0107a masa.","en_text":"","seq_num":"0","timer":"0","timer_name":"Priprema sirupa","image_file_name":null},{"id":"4446","text":"Sa mikserom,najmanjom brzinom umutiti mleko i jaje. Maslac rastopiti, malo prohladiti pa dodati predhodnoj smesi. Pome\u0161ati bra\u0161no, pra\u0161ak za pecivo, sodu bikarbonu, \u0161e\u0107er i so, pa sve zajedno sjediniti. Sa manjom kutla\u010dom (40 ml) stavljati smesu na zagrejani tiganj, da pala\u010dinka bude oko 10-12 cm. Kada po\u010dnu da se stvaraju mehuri\u0107i, uz pomo\u0107 \u0161patule okrenuti pala\u010dinku i pr\u017eiti i drugu stranu,ali mnogo kra\u0107e nego prvu. Sve ukupno, za jednu pala\u010dinku vam treba manje od jednog minuta.\r\nSla\u017eite pala\u010dinku,preliv, pala\u010dinku, preliv uz dodatak umu\u0107ene slatke pavlake i poslu\u017eite odmah.","en_text":"","seq_num":"1","timer":"0","timer_name":"Priprema
